reviews.review: Incredible gameplay for both new and older players. Fun for those who are new to the game and those who have beaten it several times over. Graphics hold up incredibly well for a game made in 2011, as do the gameplay mechanics. Few major glitches or bugs to be mentioned. Very well made coop mode with thought-provoking puzzles that can either enhance or destroy your friendship in a fun way. Great game to play with friends or family, highly recommend.
Incredible CoOp game, really can't believe I never paid for it in the past.  Was only a 5 hour coop play through, but the humor, puzzles, story, narration of the game is fully worth the 10 dollars.
this game is so cool but don't play it if you don't like swearing but other than that i give this game 5 stars cause it's the best game ever

¿Portal 2? Vale la pena los 129.99 pesos, diria que tambien vale la pena el Portal 1 pero no hace falta aclararlo, tipo ya deberias saberlo ¿Quien se compra la parte dos de un juego sin comprar el uno? Tambien te recomiendo esperar a las ofertas de Halloween, Navidad o alguna estacion del año, ya que puede salir 20 pesos o algo por el estilo. La voz de Wheatley es una hermosura, me moja, es el alivio comico que se necesita para contrarrestar a la ironia de GLaDOS, los puzzles te hacen pensar bastante, si tenes alguna deficiencia no te recomiendo jugarlo, no creo que lo termines.
En resumen, vale la pena, puzzles con alguna dificultad, buena historia y comedia. Gracias por leer

This game was responsible for me to learn abut valve. This game helped me actually start to get good at games. This game defiantly shaped my sense of humor, and my sarcasm. This was the game I made this account to play, and I have fun every time I play it. Would recommend this to get people to start playing games with story and humor and puzzles. Every time I play a game on Steam, this game is to thank.

TL;DR: Wheatly Crab and POTaTOS  are funny and made me like PC games.

Portal 2剧情延续一代，从一代结尾Boss战发生地的废墟开始讲起。相比于一代，二代画质更好，材质更真实（但是Chell仍然跟个鬼，你可以卡在两个传送门来看自己，连眼珠子都没有。。。）

这里的GLaDOS更鲜明了，还有蠢蛋维特利。还能梦回1959年看光圈一代实验室和听到Chell的母亲Caroline的声音（她在光圈一代实验室当助理）。处在地下数千米的光圈一代实验室，沧桑感和孤独感袭来。这是P2的独特魅力

相比于一代，二代的场景更加凌乱。这是在一代打败G姐后带来的mess。杂草重生、管道横纵交叉、破弃的门框和实验室道具分布在场景四周。更为故事蒙上了一层感情色彩。

GLaDOS被V社塑造的栩栩如生。她表面上表现的冷冰冰，但对Chell却很好，总是暗地里帮助她。（为了不剧透不过多阐述）

配置上作为一款十年前的游戏，画面不落后的同时配置良心。带动PUBG的电脑帧率绝对120以上。

起源引擎对光线的处理还是很棒的，这点从CSGO的玻璃和水能知道。在P2里，虽然引擎落后点，但是依然很棒

赶上促销，几块钱，别错过这个V社最棒的单机游戏！

ゲームとしての出来はもちろん、前作から続くストーリー、音楽、デザインなどどれをとっても素晴らしいと思います。
FPSだとアクションが苦手な人は敬遠しがちですが、これはゆっくりできるので問題ないです。
場所場所によってはそうでないところもありますが。

Such a great experience. Rich Storytelling. Valve has this way of helping you learn the game without taking away from the actual experience. Not much in terms of replayability, but if you have not played through yourself I highly recommend purchasing this game and getting through it. Coop is very fun and is just the right amount of difficult, though this might vary for you if you haven't had a lot of experience. Well done Valve. Please give us Portal 3.
masterpiece. just as good, if not better than the first game

this is perfect

I wrote this review, a long time ago. Almost one year. And I can still confidently say this is the best gaming experience you will have. For just $10, you can have some of the best comedic timing, writing, storytelling and some of the deepest lore told through environment and game-play.
This is Valve's most recent (excluding Alyx) "real game", and it shows that they mastered the formula of story-based game-play and beautiful environments. If you want some of the best gaming imaginable, please pick up this game. If you enjoy it, check out Valve's catalog of games. They are fantastic and will leave you hooked.
Obviously if you're reading this review, you're interested. In the words of Cave Johnson, "When life gives you lemons, make lemonade."
very fun and love the action!
